   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose: Verify the application specifics of the Wx application
   24: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: -module(wx_app_SUITE).
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   28: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   29: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   30: 
   31: -export([t/0, t/1, fields/1, modules/1, exportall/1, app_depend/1,
   32:          undef_funcs/0, undef_funcs/1, appup/1]).
   33: 
   34: -include("wx_test_lib.hrl").
   35: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   36: 
   37: 
   38: t()     -> wx_test_lib:t(?MODULE).
   39: t(Case) -> wx_test_lib:t({?MODULE, Case}).
   40: 
   41: %% Test server callbacks
   42: init_per_testcase(Case, Config0) ->
   43:     Config1 = wx_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config0),
   44:     case is_app(wx) of
   45: 	{ok, AppFile} ->
   46: 	    %% io:format("AppFile: ~n~p~n", [AppFile]),
   47: 	    [{app_file, AppFile} | Config1];
   48: 	{error, Reason} ->
   49: 	    fail(Reason)
   50:     end.
   51: 
   52: end_per_testcase(Func,Config) ->
   53:     wx_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Config).
   54: 
   55: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   56: 
   57: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}, {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   58: 
   59: all() -> 
   60:     [fields, modules, exportall, app_depend, undef_funcs, appup].
   61: 
   62: groups() -> 
   63:     [].
   64: 
   65: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   69:     ok.
   70: 
   71: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: 
   78: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   79: 
   80: is_app(App) ->
   81:     LibDir = code:lib_dir(App),
   82:     File = filename:join([LibDir, "ebin", atom_to_list(App) ++ ".app"]),
   83:     case file:consult(File) of
   84: 	{ok, [{application, App, AppFile}]} ->
   85: 	    {ok, AppFile};
   86: 	Error ->
   87: 	    {error, {invalid_format, Error}}
   88:     end.
   89: 
   90: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   91: 
   92: fields(suite) ->
   93:     [];
   94: fields(doc) ->
   95:     [];
   96: fields(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   97:     AppFile = key1search(app_file, Config),
   98:     Fields = [vsn, description, modules, registered, applications],
   99:     case check_fields(Fields, AppFile, []) of
  100: 	[] ->
  101: 	    ok;
  102: 	Missing ->
  103: 	    fail({missing_fields, Missing})
  104:     end.
  105: 
  106: check_fields([], _AppFile, Missing) ->
  107:     Missing;
  108: check_fields([Field|Fields], AppFile, Missing) ->
  109:     check_fields(Fields, AppFile, check_field(Field, AppFile, Missing)).
  110: 
  111: check_field(Name, AppFile, Missing) ->
  112:     io:format("checking field: ~p~n", [Name]),
  113:     case lists:keymember(Name, 1, AppFile) of
  114: 	true ->
  115: 	    Missing;
  116: 	false ->
  117: 	    [Name|Missing]
  118:     end.
  119: 
  120: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  121: 
  122: modules(suite) ->
  123:     [];
  124: modules(doc) ->
  125:     [];
  126: modules(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     AppFile  = key1search(app_file, Config),
  128:     Mods     = key1search(modules, AppFile),
  129:     EbinList = get_ebin_mods(wx),
  130:     case missing_modules(Mods, EbinList, []) of
  131: 	[] ->
  132: 	    ok;
  133: 	Missing ->
  134: 	    throw({error, {missing_modules, Missing}})
  135:     end,
  136:     case extra_modules(Mods, EbinList, []) of
  137: 	[] ->
  138: 	    ok;
  139: 	Extra ->
  140: 	    throw({error, {extra_modules, Extra}})
  141:     end,
  142:     {ok, Mods}.
  143: 
  144: get_ebin_mods(App) ->
  145:     LibDir  = code:lib_dir(App),
  146:     EbinDir = filename:join([LibDir,"ebin"]),
  147:     {ok, Files0} = file:list_dir(EbinDir),
  148:     Files1 = [lists:reverse(File) || File <- Files0],
  149:     [list_to_atom(lists:reverse(Name)) || [$m,$a,$e,$b,$.|Name] <- Files1].
  150: 
  151: missing_modules([], _Ebins, Missing) ->
  152:     Missing;
  153: missing_modules([Mod|Mods], Ebins, Missing) ->
  154:     case lists:member(Mod, Ebins) of
  155: 	true ->
  156: 	    missing_modules(Mods, Ebins, Missing);
  157: 	false ->
  158: 	    io:format("missing module: ~p~n", [Mod]),
  159: 	    missing_modules(Mods, Ebins, [Mod|Missing])
  160:     end.
  161: 
  162: 
  163: extra_modules(_Mods, [], Extra) ->
  164:     Extra;
  165: extra_modules(Mods, [Mod|Ebins], Extra) ->
  166:     case lists:member(Mod, Mods) of
  167: 	true ->
  168: 	    extra_modules(Mods, Ebins, Extra);
  169: 	false ->
  170: 	    io:format("supefluous module: ~p~n", [Mod]),
  171: 	    extra_modules(Mods, Ebins, [Mod|Extra])
  172:     end.
  173: 
  174: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  175: 
  176: exportall(suite) ->
  177:     [];
  178: exportall(doc) ->
  179:     [];
  180: exportall(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  181:     AppFile = key1search(app_file, Config),
  182:     Mods    = key1search(modules, AppFile),
  183:     check_export_all(Mods).
  184: 
  185: 
  186: check_export_all([]) ->
  187:     ok;
  188: check_export_all([Mod|Mods]) ->
  189:     case (catch apply(Mod, module_info, [compile])) of
  190: 	{'EXIT', {undef, _}} ->
  191: 	    check_export_all(Mods);
  192: 	O ->
  193:             case lists:keysearch(options, 1, O) of
  194:                 false ->
  195:                     check_export_all(Mods);
  196:                 {value, {options, List}} ->
  197:                     case lists:member(export_all, List) of
  198:                         true ->
  199: 			    throw({error, {export_all, Mod}});
  200: 			false ->
  201: 			    check_export_all(Mods)
  202:                     end
  203:             end
  204:     end.
  205: 
  206: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  207: 
  208: app_depend(suite) ->
  209:     [];
  210: app_depend(doc) ->
  211:     [];
  212: app_depend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  213:     AppFile = key1search(app_file, Config),
  214:     Apps    = key1search(applications, AppFile),
  215:     check_apps(Apps).
  216: 
  217: check_apps([]) ->
  218:     ok;
  219: check_apps([App|Apps]) ->
  220:     case is_app(App) of
  221: 	{ok, _} ->
  222: 	    check_apps(Apps);
  223: 	Error ->
  224: 	    throw({error, {missing_app, {App, Error}}})
  225:     end.
  226: 
  227: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  228: 
  229: undef_funcs() ->
  230:     [{timetrap,{minutes,10}}].
  231: 
  232: undef_funcs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  233:     App            = wx,
  234:     AppFile        = key1search(app_file, Config),
  235:     Mods           = key1search(modules, AppFile),
  236:     Root           = code:root_dir(),
  237:     LibDir         = code:lib_dir(App),
  238:     EbinDir        = filename:join([LibDir,"ebin"]),
  239:     XRefTestName   = undef_funcs_make_name(App, xref_test_name),
  240:     {ok, XRef}     = xref:start(XRefTestName),
  241:     ok             = xref:set_default(XRef,
  242:                                       [{verbose,false},{warnings,false}]),
  243:     XRefName       = undef_funcs_make_name(App, xref_name),
  244:     {ok, XRefName} = xref:add_release(XRef, Root, {name,XRefName}),
  245:     {ok, App}      = xref:replace_application(XRef, App, EbinDir),
  246:     {ok, Undefs}   = xref:analyze(XRef, undefined_function_calls),
  247:     xref:stop(XRef),
  248:     analyze_undefined_function_calls(Undefs, Mods, []).
  249: 
  250: analyze_undefined_function_calls([], _, []) ->
  251:     ok;
  252: analyze_undefined_function_calls([], _, AppUndefs) ->
  253:     exit({suite_failed, {undefined_function_calls, AppUndefs}});
  254: analyze_undefined_function_calls([{{Mod, _F, _A}, _C} = AppUndef|Undefs],
  255:                                  AppModules, AppUndefs) ->
  256:     %% Check that this module is ours
  257:     case lists:member(Mod,AppModules) of
  258:         true ->
  259:             {Calling,Called} = AppUndef,
  260:             {Mod1,Func1,Ar1} = Calling,
  261:             {Mod2,Func2,Ar2} = Called,
  262:             io:format("undefined function call: "
  263:                       "~n   ~w:~w/~w calls ~w:~w/~w~n",
  264:                       [Mod1,Func1,Ar1,Mod2,Func2,Ar2]),
  265:             analyze_undefined_function_calls(Undefs, AppModules,
  266:                                              [AppUndef|AppUndefs]);
  267:         false ->
  268:             io:format("dropping ~p~n", [Mod]),
  269:             analyze_undefined_function_calls(Undefs, AppModules, AppUndefs)
  270:     end.
  271: 
  272: %% This function is used simply to avoid cut-and-paste errors later...
  273: undef_funcs_make_name(App, PostFix) ->
  274:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(App) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(PostFix)).
  275: 
  276: 
  277: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  278: 
  279: fail(Reason) ->
  280:     exit({suite_failed, Reason}).
  281: 
  282: key1search(Key, L) ->
  283:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, L) of
  284: 	false ->
  285: 	    fail({not_found, Key, L});
  286: 	{value, {Key, Value}} ->
  287: 	    Value
  288:     end.
  289: 
  290: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  291: 
  292: %% Test that the wx appup file is ok
  293: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  294:     ok = test_server:appup_test(wx).
